availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, druggist. Native of Germany. Son of John Henry Schmidt. Druggist in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 72.
Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner's Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), p. 216.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989 Vol. 6-7, 1862-1872, (Jefferson County, KY: County Court), p. 128-129.
